articles.author: Clea Caulcutt
articles.title: Macron calls on US, Europe to lift sanctions on Syria - politico.eu
articles.description: Syria’s new leader was in Paris to lobby for support from the international community.
articles.content:
Al-Sharaa, a former Al Qaeda member, has received a cautious welcome from the international community after his forces toppled brutal Syrian dictator Bashar Assad late last year.
He has vowed to pro… [+1033 chars]
